00208 class GridAx
00209 : public wxWindowAccessible
00210 {
00211 
00212  public:
00213    
00214    GridAx(Grid *grid, GridAx *parent, wxAccRole role, int row, int col);
00215 
00216    void SetCurrentCell(int row, int col);
00217    void TableUpdated();
00218 
00219    // Retrieves the address of an IDispatch interface for the specified child.
00220    // All objects must support this property.
00221    virtual wxAccStatus GetChild( int childId, wxAccessible** child );
00222 
00223    // Gets the number of children.
00224    virtual wxAccStatus GetChildCount(int* childCount);
00225 
00226    // Gets the default action for this object (0) or > 0 (the action for a child).
00227    // Return wxACC_OK even if there is no action. actionName is the action, or the empty
00228    // string if there is no action.
00229    // The retrieved string describes the action that is performed on an object,
00230    // not what the object does as a result. For example, a toolbar button that prints
00231    // a document has a default action of "Press" rather than "Prints the current document."
00232    virtual wxAccStatus GetDefaultAction( int childId, wxString *actionName );
00233 
00234    // Returns the description for this object or a child.
00235    virtual wxAccStatus GetDescription( int childId, wxString *description );
00236 
00237    // Gets the window with the keyboard focus.
00238    // If childId is 0 and child is NULL, no object in
00239    // this subhierarchy has the focus.
00240    // If this object has the focus, child should be 'this'.
00241    virtual wxAccStatus GetFocus( int *childId, wxAccessible **child );
00242 
00243    // Returns help text for this object or a child, similar to tooltip text.
00244    virtual wxAccStatus GetHelpText( int childId, wxString *helpText );
00245 
00246    // Returns the keyboard shortcut for this object or child.
00247    // Return e.g. ALT+K
00248    virtual wxAccStatus GetKeyboardShortcut( int childId, wxString *shortcut );
00249 
00250    // Returns the rectangle for this object (id = 0) or a child element (id > 0).
00251    // rect is in screen coordinates.
00252    virtual wxAccStatus GetLocation( wxRect& rect, int elementId );
00253 
00254    // Gets the name of the specified object.
00255    virtual wxAccStatus GetName( int childId, wxString *name );
00256 
00257    // Gets the parent, or NULL.
00258    virtual wxAccStatus GetParent(wxAccessible **parent);
00259 
00260    // Returns a role constant.
00261    virtual wxAccStatus GetRole( int childId, wxAccRole *role );
00262 
00263    // Gets a variant representing the selected children
00264    // of this object.
00265    // Acceptable values:
00266    // - a null variant (IsNull() returns TRUE)
00267    // - a list variant (GetType() == wxT("list"))
00268    // - an integer representing the selected child element,
00269    //   or 0 if this object is selected (GetType() == wxT("long"))
00270    // - a "void*" pointer to a wxAccessible child object
00271    virtual wxAccStatus GetSelections( wxVariant *selections );
00272 
00273    // Returns a state constant.
00274    virtual wxAccStatus GetState(int childId, long* state);
00275 
00276    // Returns a localized string representing the value for the object
00277    // or child.
00278    virtual wxAccStatus GetValue(int childId, wxString* strValue);
00279 
00280    GridAx *mParent;
00281    Grid *mGrid;
00282    wxAccRole mRole;
00283    int mRow;
00284    int mCol;
00285 
00286 };
